Shawn Marion

Shawn Dwayne Marion

(The Matrix)

Position: Small Forward and Power Forward ▪ Shoots: Right

6-7, 220lb (201cm, 99kg)

Born: May 7, 1978 in Waukegan, Illinois us

Colleges: Vincennes University, UNLV

High School: Clarksville in Clarksville, Tennessee

Draft: Phoenix Suns, 1st round (9th pick, 9th overall), 1999 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 2, 1999

Career Length: 16 years

  • 4x All Star
  • 2011 NBA Champ

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Shawn Marion?

Shawn Marion is 46 years old.

Where was Shawn Marion born?

Shawn Marion was born in Waukegan, Illinois.

When was Shawn Marion born?

Shawn Marion was born on May 7, 1978.

How tall is Shawn Marion?

Shawn Marion is 6-7 (201 cm) tall.

How much did Shawn Marion weigh when playing?

Shawn Marion weighed 220 lbs (99 kg) when playing.

Is Shawn Marion in the Hall of Fame?

Shawn Marion is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Shawn Marion drafted?

Shawn Marion was drafted by Phoenix Suns, 1st round (9th pick, 9th overall), 1999 NBA Draft.

What position did Shawn Marion play?

Small Forward and Power Forward.

When did Shawn Marion retire?

Shawn Marion last played in 2015.

What is Shawn Marion's net worth?

Shawn Marion made at least $134,936,762 playing professional basketball.

How much did Shawn Marion make?

Shawn Marion made $17,810,000 in 2009.

What did Shawn Marion average?

Shawn Marion averaged 15.2 points, 8.7 rebounds, and 1.9 assists per game.

How many rings does Shawn Marion have?

Shawn Marion won one championship.

What is Shawn Marion's Twitter account?

Shawn Marion is on Twitter at matrix31.

What schools did Shawn Marion attend?

Shawn Marion attended Clarksville in Clarksville, Tennessee, Vincennes University and UNLV.

What are Shawn Marion's nicknames?

The Matrix is a nickname for Shawn Marion.
